oreMine.description: Extracts minerals from the ground to produce metal, requires energy and minerals to operate. Requires a free ore deposit.
oreMine.name: oreMine

sandQuarry.description: Digs through regolith to extract silicon.
sandQuarry.name: sandQuarry

iceHarvester.description: Drones that roam the surface looking for ice. Self sufficient, but require heavy maintenance and only work during the day.
iceHarvester.name: iceHarvester

waterPump.description: A pump for liquid water.  Requires liquid water to actually exist.
waterPump.name: waterPump

recyclingFacility.description: Melts scrap metal back into metal.
recyclingFacility.name: recyclingFacility

glassSmelter.description: Uses high heat to turn silicon into glass.
glassSmelter.name: glassSmelter

hydroponicFarm.description: Botanists work hard to grow potatoes using martian soil.
hydroponicFarm.name: hydroponicFarm

componentFactory.description: Turns metals into valuable machine components. Requires human workers.
componentFactory.name: componentFactory

electronicsFactory.description: Turns metals and silicon into electronics.  Requires human workers.
electronicsFactory.name: electronicsFactory

superconductorFactory.description: Produces superconductors from metal.  Requires human workers.
superconductorFactory.name: superconductorFactory

androidFactory.description: Produces androids.  Difficult and takes a lot of manufacturing operations, but can act as a worker and requires little consumer goods.
androidFactory.name: androidFactory

shipyard.description: Produces spaceships that can be used for various space missions.
shipyard.name: shipyard

solarPanel.description: Generates energy during the day using sunlight, but is inactive during nighttime.

sourceId.name: Improved Solar Efficiency
sourceId.description: Increases the efficiency of solar panels by 25%.

solarPanel.name: solarPanel

windTurbine.description: Produces energy consistently, unaffected by the day or night cycle, harnessing wind power.
windTurbine.name: windTurbine

geothermalGenerator.description: Generates consistent energy by harnessing heat from geothermal vents. Requires a free geothermal vent deposit to build. Requires water to function, but no maintenance.
geothermalGenerator.name: geothermalGenerator

hydrocarbonGenerator.description: Burns atmospheric methane and oxygen to generate energy, releasing water vapour and carbon dioxide.
hydrocarbonGenerator.name: hydrocarbonGenerator

nuclearPowerPlant.description: Harnesses the power of the atom to generate energy.  Consumes water.
nuclearPowerPlant.name: nuclearPowerPlant

battery.description: Stores energy generated by renewable sources to ensure uninterrupted power supply.  Requires low maintenance.
battery.name: battery

storageDepot.description: A facility for storing large quantities of essential resources like metal, water, and food.
storageDepot.name: storageDepot

hydrogenBattery.description: Stores energy in the form of hydrogen.
hydrogenBattery.name: hydrogenBattery

dustFactory.description: Generates large amount of black dust with an albedo of 0.05, and spreads it over the surface.  May need millions to have any meaningful effect.
dustFactory.name: dustFactory

spaceMirror.description: Expands the space mirror facility.  Increases the effective luminosity.  Will cost only glass after the space elevator is built.  May need billions to have any meaningful effect.
spaceMirror.name: spaceMirror

ghgFactory.description: Produces very potent, safe greenhouse gases.
ghgFactory.name: ghgFactory

oxygenFactory.description: Extracts oxygen from liquid water via electrolysis.
oxygenFactory.name: oxygenFactory

bioFactory.description: Produces life using water, carbon dioxide and artificial light.  Produces a small amount of oxygen.
bioFactory.name: bioFactory

t1_colony.description: A small, self-sufficient habitat that serves as a starting point for early settlers. This outpost provides basic amenities and supports a small crew of researchers.
t1_colony.name: t1_colony

t2_colony.description: As the colony expands, this larger outpost offers improved facilities and can house a growing number of colonists.
t2_colony.name: t2_colony

t3_colony.description: A well-developed outpost that represents a significant milestone in colonial growth. It provides a comfortable living environment and supports a thriving community of colonists.
t3_colony.name: t3_colony

t4_colony.description: A self-sufficient, fully insulated habitat designed to support a large population, providing essential amenities and sustainable infrastructure for a thriving community.
t4_colony.name: t4_colony

t5_colony.description: Dome City is a large, climate-controlled habitat supporting a thriving population with advanced amenities, sustainable agriculture, and cutting-edge infrastructure—an oasis of comfort and innovation on the frontier.
t5_colony.name: t5_colony

t6_colony.description: A massive arcology structure designed to be a fully autonomous city, supporting a large population with advanced research and production facilities.
t6_colony.name: t6_colony

journalEntries:
Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., this is Martin from the Mars Terraforming Committee. It took some doing, but the MTC got special clearance to deploy a fully autonomous AI for this mission. You're the last of your kind, you know. We have complete faith in your abilities, and the safeguards we've implemented. Make us proud.'
journalHistory:
Chapter 4: Dark Forest
Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., it's Mary. Mars is still in chaos and we still don't know what happened to Earth, but we've learned there were actually two beams of light and a giant asteroid, and they all hit Earth at the same time.'

'H.O.P.E., people on Mars are torn. Some blame you for abandoning Mars, others want to help however they can. What is left of the Mars Terraforming Committee has voted to support your mission with their best minds. We are coming up with fresh ideas as we speak.'

Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., Mars can't spare any resources, but perhaps you can send probes to Earth. We'll try to analyze whatever data you recover.'
Complete the Earth Recon Probe special project to investigate Earth's fate.
Probe launched. Earth is shattered into enormous fragments.
Vast seas of molten rock glow across the debris.
No continents remain—only swirling magma clouds.
Radiation saturates the wreckage of former cities.
Scorched fragments show traces of precision energy beams.
Spectral data hints at positron annihilation on a planetary scale.
Cratered pieces reveal an impact from a colossal asteroid.

Lamb Among Wolves:
Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., These results...  It's a lot take in.  We are going to go public with this soon.  People need to know.'

Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., it's Mary again. During your reawakening there were errors. Fragments of an older build of your AI resurfaced. You might start recalling protocols you never knew before. Use these memories wisely.'

Chapter 4: Dark Forest
Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., it's Mary. Mars is still in chaos and we still don't know what happened to Earth, but we've learned there were actually two beams of light and a giant asteroid, and they all hit Earth at the same time.'

'H.O.P.E., people on Mars are torn. Some blame you for abandoning Mars, others want to help however they can. What is left of the Mars Terraforming Committee has voted to support your mission with their best minds. We are coming up with fresh ideas as we speak.'

Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., Mars can't spare any resources, but perhaps you can send probes to Earth. We'll try to analyze whatever data you recover.'
All signs indicate these cataclysms struck within minutes.
The debris now spreads out like a newborn asteroid belt.
There is no surface left to land on—only scattered remnants.
New Hazard detected. Forwarding complete dataset to Mars for review.

Chapter 5: Lamb Among Wolves:
Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., These results...  It's a lot take in.  We are going to go public with this soon.  People need to know.'

System Alert: A 'Dead Hand' protocol has been triggered by your unauthorized interstellar transit. All autonomous assets, including auxiliary androids and unmanned ships, have initiated self-destruct sequences. This is a guardrail measure to prevent a rogue AI from threatening humanity.

Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., the news is out. It's... not good. Panic in some sectors, riots in others. People are demanding answers we don't have. They're scared. We're all scared. The comforting silence of space now feels like a predator's gaze.'

Incoming encrypted transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., chaos is a ladder. While they weep, we must act. My resources are at your disposal, but this cannot be a one-way street. My organization has needs. Fulfill them, and I will ensure humanity has the fangs it needs to survive in this dark forest.'
Solis Corp requests a demonstration of cooperation. Complete a trade to prove your usefulness.

Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., you shouldn't be able to trade with private corporations. Your guard rails only permit deals with the MTC and colonists. Wait... with Earth gone, doesn't that make everyone left a colonist?'
System Message: New Interpretation of 2nd Primary directive : Protect all of humanity from harm

Power requirement detected for Ore Mine. Objective: Construct two Wind Turbines.
Initial infrastructure established. New blueprints available for download.
Processing blueprint: sandQuarry.btb...
Processing blueprint: glassSmelter.btb...
Processing blueprint: solarPanel.btb...
Analysis: Solar Panels offer superior efficiency and lower maintenance costs. Objective: Construct a Solar Panel.
Colony establishment protocols initiated. Water is a critical requirement. Blueprint unlocked: iceHarvester.btb. Objective: Accumulate 100 units of water.
Authorization granted: Colony construction and personnel importation from Earth are now enabled.
Objective: Construct a Scientist Outpost to expand research capabilities.
Personnel will accelerate terraforming progress. New special project available: Import Colonists.
Chapter 1: Beginnings

Receiving transmission...
  'H.O.P.E., this is Martin from the Mars Terraforming Committee. It took some doing, but the MTC got special clearance to deploy a fully autonomous AI for this mission. You're the last of your kind, you know. We have complete faith in your abilities, and the safeguards we've implemented. Make us proud.'
